resources.string: all images include sub folders\nshuffle display order\nfile delete function
Image viewer for simple UI, fast speed, random order, delete function and including all sub folders.
Scan and save your folder infomation
The viewer scan the information of file.\nIt will be operated at your first access and path change. Re-can is recommended when folder add and file add.
Slideshow start.\nTouch the screen, Slideshow will finish.
This is file moving function. If you set a folder to move the file, folder path is remembered. At any time can be changed through the folder settings.

If you touch the screen will be changed to the next image. While maintaining the ratio, the image is displayed in the largest possible size of the device. If you touch the icon functions are executed.\n
Delete the currently displayed image file.
The information currently displayed image file is displayed.
Replacement cycle will change the image of the slide show.
Please set your root folder\nDo not set /mnt/sdcard\nex) /mnt/sdcar/dcim
folder is not exist. please set another path.
/mnt/sdcard can not be set. please set another path
All files in selected folders are scanning. Please wait a moment.

V 1.0 (2012.02.27) 
- Android market released. 
- Base folder path save. 
- include all sub folders of base folder. 
- random order display. 
- displayed File delete.

V 1.5 (2012.03.01) 
 -Slideshow function added. 
 -App information page added. 
 -Viewer icon changed. 
 -Viewer image change speed improved. 
 -Loading animation added.

V 2.0 (2012.03.03) 
 -Way of Path setting was changed to explorer. 
 -After Path setting, image of previous Path was displayed. changed to auto re-scan. 
 -App Icon changed. 
 -Main page layout changed. 
 -User slot add. 
 -In order to support different LCD size devices, Object Size unit was changed to DPI.

V 2.7 (2012.03.10) 
 -Improved search algorithm. 
 -App setting page added. 
 -File delete warning popup added. 
 -Viewer help page added. 
 -Separate application and version information. 
 -App Icon changed. 
 -Main page layout changed. 
 -Viewer icon changed. 
 -Fixed file size of zero dead.

V 3.0 (2012.03.11) 
- App name changed. 
- Viewer icon changed. 
- When app update, Delete previous versions of data.

V 3.2 (2012.03.15) 
- File move function added. 
- Icon changed. 
- When the viewer is running, abnormal Delete Files. 
- /mnt /sdcard folder can be specified to change.

V 3.6 (2012.03.15) 
- Widget added. 
- Folder explorer layout changed. 
- After app update, to maintain folder setting . 
- Scroll effect of long additional sentence added. 
- Death in the absence of an image file in the selected folder is Fixed.

V 3.8 (2012.03.24) 
- Widgets and apps have been separated. Now the widget folder will be set at runtime. 
- UI adjustment for multiple resolution devices. 
- Foler scaning info page removed.
